price: موږ له دوى مخكې څومره ولسونه تباه كړل چې (ډېرې) چيغې بغارې يې ووهلې خو هغه وخت د خلاصون (وخت) نه و.
arabic: كَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِهِم مِّن قَرۡنٖ فَنَادَواْ وَّلَاتَ حِينَ مَنَاصٖ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: kam ahlaknā min qablihim min qarnin fanādaw walāta ḥīna manāṣin
